fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.bloomorgloom2

Class TapParticle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.bloomorgloom2.TapParticle

  • public class TapParticle
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    The TapParticle class creates particles when the screen is tapped. The particles are created around players head and utilize LibGDX's Actor class to fade the textures in and out.

      Handles the fading in and out of particles.

      Moves particles according to its vector.

    • Method Detail

      • createParticle

        public void createParticle(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 headPos)
        Creates a new particle.
        Parameters:
        headPos - Vector2 Character's head position.

      • renderParticles

        public void renderParticles(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                            float delta)
        Manages each particle's attributes and draws them. Goes through the list containing the particles, calls supporting methods to move, fade and destroy particles and finally draws them.
        Parameters:
        batch - SpriteBatch needed for drawing the particles.
        delta - Delta time used by the act() method of the Actor class.

      • fadeParticle

        public void fadeParticle()
        Handles the fading in and out of particles.

      • moveParticle

        public void moveParticle()
        Moves particles according to its vector.

      • destroyParticle

        public void destroyParticle()
        Removes a particle from the Particles list once its timer and opacity reach zero.
